As I am aware that I don't have nearly as many hours in this game as some other reviewers do, I still want to express my emotions for the tragedy of a game that is Dead By Daylight. After countless times of trying to give this game a chance, I read a review on the store page that inspired me to also share my opinions on this heap of garbage. If I had to use one word to describe the game, or rather 2, they would be "broken" and "unbalanced". Allow me to explain:

Broken:

There are so many aspects to this game they flat out don't work sometimes. Because there are so many of them, I will try to remember to the best of my ability. I have a game that I recorded where Leatherface was chasing me while he had his chainsaw ability active. I was a solid 4-6 feet away from a window that I just vaulted through and he was able to slash me through the window. This was the most egregious case, but there have been plenty others where the killer will be able to land a hit on you through a window or pallet. There are also plenty of cases where the pallet will allow the killer to go through the pallet as it's being dropped and still be able to injure you, while also stunning them. Which is it? Did I just stun the killer or did I get slashed? I play with a group of friends almost every night (sadly) and there have been several times where my friends will get grade progress errors and (in a game they did really well in) and it will count for nothing because the game crashed. I play on PC and they play on console. I have yet to have the issue myself, but one of my friends in particular has had it happen to her atleast 10 times...ATLEAST. Several games we have played also include killers that just have no audio or heartbeat indication before they're stabbing a knife in your chest. And before you say anything, I know that there are some killers that have abilities (i.e. Michael Myers, Ghostface) that disable their audio in an attempt to "sneak up on" or "stalk" their victims. This doesn't apply to those people. I can't tell you how many times I have looked at the post game report and there have been no item addons or perks that make it so they have no sound, yet that was a consistent problem all game. 


Unbalanced:

This game is so one-sided, it's actually almost funny. I have heard some people say that this game is "caTerEd toWarDs tHe suRviVor", to which I ask them one question: Have you been playing with your monitor off the entire time? There are so many perks that cater towards the killer and making the killer stronger that it makes the perks they give to the survivors laughable. There are these "Hex" totems which latch on to "dull" totems at the start of the game. The developers made it so that these OP hexes don't have any limit as to how many you can have on at the same (other than the existing limit of having 4 perks on). There was one game where 1 killer had all of their perks be hexes. Yeah, I'll pass. Not to mention that one hex in particular, NOED (No One Escapes Death) completely rewards a killer at the end of the game who could have had the worst game possible. It makes it so that they could go from not killing 1 person, to killing all of them in a matter of seconds. Yes, survivors have a bevy of perks that make it annoying for the killer to be able to hook them, chase them, see them, etc. The killers, however, have so many perks that just disable the effects of survivor perks that it makes it so one-sided you might as well not run any perks as a survivor. I know that's being hyperbolic, but I'm angry dangit.

It's also very sad that it seems the developers have no interest in fixing their game. There have been SO many times this has been clear, I can't even remember them all. On a separate note, the steam page for the game had a killer on the profile screen from 2 chapter ago when a new killer had JUST been released...I'm not joking. Does nobody monitor their community page?? LOL. The team also seems so incredibly adverse to criticism that it even makes me wonder why they made the game public. I've seen a bunch of people complain about the game and nothing be done about it. It just makes you wonder why we even waste our breath in the first place.

Well there you have it. This is just a glimpse into the mediocrity that is beHAVIOR Interactive and its monstrosity of a game that they have created. I have created a list of 60+ complaints that I have about this game that I otherwise would have shared in this post, but I'd rather one day be hired by this company and see them burn to the ground from the inside than give that information out for free. I'll admit, I have had fun with this game. If you have a group of friends to play with, please, and I mean PLEASE keep them far away from this trash as possible. The bad in this game has outweighed the fun in every category. I have had to get off a couple nights because the game is just bad for my health. If I've kept anybody from playing this game then my mission was successful. PLEASE don't waste your money on it. In the end, it's not worth it.
this game is sooooo fun to play alone and with friends

It's a good game when you actually get into a balanced game with people who are at the same skill level as you. I say this mainly because the matchmaking is probably one of the worst ones ever, it is extremely unbalanced, it will put the lowest ranks against people who've been playing the game since the launch. Other than that, it's pretty good with friends.

Shit game by shit developers that could be arsed to ever QA their own game or understand what balancing is. Only reason they're still around after all this time is because they have zero competition. 
Matchmaking is busted, 

Survivor and Killer balance is busted so if you haven't already been grinding out millions of bloodpoints and buying all the DLC to unlock all the meta perks and then only ever use those and nothing else you may as well not bother play because without all of that you will just get shit on because this game is 10% skill, 90% abusing the busted perks meta.

Oh and the game itself is a broken piece of shit with myriad bugs, some of them game breaking, many of them have been known of for years and never fixed because all this studio is good at is making sure they push out a new chapter to sell you every 3 months, QA be damned. 

I'm not kidding. If you're new to this game and looking to play killer? Don't bother, Killers are in the worst spot they've been in since basically the launch of the game and you will just repeatedly get shit on by the game pairing you with survivor friend stacks running meta perks.

If you're new and want to play survivor but are doing it solo? Don't bother because any halfway decent killer will immediately notice you're the weak-link and immediately tunnel you out of the match for a quick advantage.

I can only recommend this piece of shit game if you intend to go in with 2 or 3 friends as a survivor group and immediately look up a current meta guide and start grinding together to get those busted survivor perks ASAP.

Shame on Behavior, lazy bastards the lot of them. Hope this game dies so those licensed characters get a chance to be in another, hopefully better, game at some point.
好游戏，持续更新了那么多年，每个版本都很有趣，很平衡，和屠夫之间的博弈是我最喜欢的！

The chances of this game being made better are next to none, the Devs seems to hate every killer player and all survivor players that don't have a group to play with. The community seems to think that the win condition is making the other side have as little fun as possible and the devs encourage this. If you are not already very good at playing a high tier killer i cannot recommend playing killer at all. The only reason this game continues to shamble on as it does is because the basic gameplay concept is so fun and even though it so rarely happens people keep playing because they want that fun back despite that even when it happens its not worth the genuinely awful matches that are best described as similar to dealing with a drunk boomer at a retail job.

De los 4 Años que juego Dead by Daylight Me gusta mucho el juego de survival como killer. Pero la Toxicidad contra el killer y entre survival que hay es tremenda . Como survival muchas veces estas haciendo un generador y otro survival te trae al Killer apropocito o tambien te esta sigiendo el killer tenes un pale para resistir mas contra el killer y viene otro survival y te bloquea el paso para que el killer te pegue. Y jugar de killer jugas bien el mismo equipo se regala contra el killer y al final de la partida le echan la culpa al Killer o lo insultan cuando ellos mismos no saben jugar , Tambien me paso estoy jugando de killer y estoy en vivo transmitiendo la partida y cuando termina gane o pierda me insultan en el juego y despues se pasan por mi canal a insultar o a reirse es como es un juego cual es la necesidad de hacer eso.  Yo llegue a jugar contra gente Premade como killer y la verdad en premade te das re cuenta que el juego esta balanceado para los survival el juego no esta balanceado para ambos si n opara los survival. Estaria bueno que hagan algo con esta toxicidad y balanceado el juego ,Si afuturo arreglan esto lo cambiare de negativo a positivo

Это отвратительная игре. Скатилась в лютый треш. Баланс абсолютно и полностью повернут в сторону выживших. Все играют в команде со связью. Над маньяками просто занимаются диким угаром. Им не надо спешить, они тупо чилят, выжившие расслабились и обнаглели. Я стал любить играть за выживших, но игра вынуждает ночью играть за маньяков, не давая комфортно искать игру, задерживая меня в меню игры по 10 минут (я играю ночью). Я люблю маньяков и отказываюсь от игры за них. И что бы это говно хоть как- то выживало, либо играешь на маньяках, либо не играешь вообще. Это треш. Я интроверт до мозга костей, друзей не завожу, но то, что в эту пар**у играют 80 процентов сурвов в команде, разработчиков ни как не заботит. Вам ничего не сделать против команды в 8 из 10 случаев, по определению, за пешего маньяка. 
Читеры в игре как еще одна функция. Разработчикам абсолютно наплевать на эту проблему, они просто сделали раздачу игры бесплатно для всех) 
В общем я хороню это глубоко в своей голове и постараюсь в это больше не играть. Добрых 2к часов я потратил тут (разные аккаунты), я имею право судить о достоинствах и недостатках. Они кристально видны. 4 сурва и один маньяк. 80%- это выжившие, 20%- маньяки. Я не к тому, что нужно менять баланс в количестве игроков. Я к  тому, что бы вы открыли глаза и поняли, кого разработчикам выгоднее веселить. 
Я с огромной болью в сердце буду пытаться искать другие проекты и постараюсь веселиться в них. Хотя, похоже, лучше переключиться на одиночные проекты, а может и книги. Покойся с миром, дбд, я буду помнить тебя самой лучшей.

I have played this game since release for xbox years ago and had about 2,000 hours on it. This game for me is very fun to play, especially with others. I also enjoy solo que so I can play how I want whether the perks be for self preservation or team work. Dead by Daylight is not perfect by any means and it never will be as the game will constantly tilt to survivor favor then to killer. I would highly recommend this game to anyone that enjoy's a game that can be played solo survivor or with a group. You may just want to play as the killer and push yourself against other skilled people. For me the fun in the game is no game is usually the same, different perks can be put together, different builds and you always play with different people. Not every experience will be good though so I recommend having an open mind if playing, My recommendation is to get it, not exceed the two hour limit for steam and if you do not like it then refund it. See  you all in the fog :)
